metadata.synopsis: DaisyAD that plays on entering SCL from either entry point.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load either of the SCL entry points from the debug book and walk towards the center of the map.

0.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
0.text: We are approaching the Absolute. A telepathic storm is surging all around us.

1.speaker: GROUP_Daisy
1.text: And the eye of the storm lies above that tower.
